entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of showers later this morning. Showers beginning early this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
